verbs.description: rosemary - apricot pork tenderloin you [V: 'll] be surprised at how quickly this dish comes together for an easy weeknight meal and with very little effort you 'll have tender and juicy meat that begs to be added to a salad or sandwich the next day —marie rizzio interlochen michigan sears
